alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 06 at 3:18AM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4412 7566 4424 7559 4437 7576 4435 7584 4421 7619 4406 7637 4386 7637 4382 7620 4398 7584 4402 7583 TIME Y22M01D06T0500Z-Y22M01D06T0900Z COORD...4400 7559 4417 7553 4418 7562 4410 7591 4407 7606 4391 7637 4381 7629 4381 7605 4388 7589 4392 7570 TIME Y22M01D06T0900Z-Y22M01D06T1200Z COORD...4405 7525 4412 7587 4410 7615 4401 7637 4386 7637 4370 7625 4374 7601 4382 7578 4382 7551 4390 7528 TIME Y22M01D06T1200Z-Y22M01D06T1800Z COORD...4404 7531 4412 7593 4408 7636 4386 7637 4383 7629 4370 7625 4369 7614 4381 7587 4380 7551 4390 7528 TIME Y22M01D06T1800Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
